thread.title: Oscars 2017: All the red carpet fashion
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: All the red carpet fashion

title: Oscars 2017: All the red carpet fashion
text:
26 February 2017 1 /27 
There was no shortage of glitz and glamour at the Academy Awards on Sunday night. Stars including Emma Stone and Amy Adams pulled out all the stops on the red carpet at Hollywood's Dolby Theatre, wearing showstopping gowns and equally dazzling accessories. 
Leading ladies including Ruth Negga , Nicole Kidman and Viola Davis brought awards season to a close in style, in memorable ensembles from designers including Valentino, Marchesa and Louis Vuitton. Meanwhile there were more stunning style moments from the 2016 Oscar winners-turned-presenters such as Brie Larson and Alicia Vikander. Click through to see all the dresses from the 2017 Oscars... 
Best Actress nominee Ruth Negga wowed in a red custom Valentino gown, which she accessorised with a red headband and dazzling drop earrings. Photo: © Getty Images
